NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Hey Ma Liang, could you help an old man?

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Sure, what kind of help do you need?

NAME: TRANSITION_1
MESSAGE: After the eventful day, you return to your place for some rest. You fall asleep, thinking that you will be visiting the market tomorrow to find more people to help with this newfound power…

NAME: INTRODUCTION
MESSAGE: A long time ago, in Ancient China, there lived a young child herding cattle on the land, ruled by an evil and greedy emperor.

NAME: INTRODUCTION
MESSAGE: The child had a very kind heart but was very poor. Despite the lack of wealth, the child always looked for ways to help others.

NAME: INTRODUCTION
MESSAGE: The child also loved to paint, but could not afford ink and papers and would draw on sands with sticks

NAME: INTRODUCTION
MESSAGE: One day, the child left his place in the morning to find people to help. But this day will not be like any other days...

NAME: RICE
MESSAGE: Tradition food item. Is a staple for all sorts of food for all classes, such as rice cakes.

NAME: PEACHES
MESSAGE: Delicious fruit that was highly sought after.

NAME: APRICOTS
MESSAGE: Common fruit that was used in many baked goods.

NAME: FISH
MESSAGE: Common meat staple, fish was usually regarded as serf food.

NAME: PEPPERS
MESSAGE: Is a hot pepper that is used in many sauses such as Hunanese or Sichuanese.

NAME: POWDER
MESSAGE: By blending hot peppers and other herbs, spice was reserved for food of the royals.

NAME: SILK
MESSAGE: Silk is a very fine and luxeroues fabric, it and spices inspired the famous silk road.
